headline: EPAM and Oracle Collaborate to Accelerate Adoption of AI-Powered Cloud Solutions
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced it has expanded its collaboration with Oracle to help enterprises across industries — including healthcare, life sciences, financial services and insurance — to integrate Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) and AI services into their cloud strategies.
